description:
Are you a data entry enthusiast looking for an exciting opportunity? Join our fast-growing team as a Data Entry Specialist and become part of our journey to excellence! Based in Grand Junction, CO, we are on the lookout for a detail-oriented individual to help us manage our expanding client base.

Why You'll Love This Job

In-Person Collaboration: Enjoy the camaraderie and teamwork of working in person with a dynamic team.

Competitive Pay: Earn $15 per hour.

Growth Opportunities: Benefit from comprehensive training, personal and professional development, and a clear path for career advancement.

Work-Life Balance: Enjoy a Monday to Friday schedule from 8 AM to 5 PM, with weekends and major holidays off.

What You'll Do

Data Management: Enter customer data into our computer system with accuracy and efficiency.

Verification: Verify data from various online applications to ensure accuracy.

Collaboration: Work closely with team members to support our growing client base and contribute to process improvements.

Documentation: Maintain organized records of data entries and ensure information is up-to-date.

What We're Looking For

Typing Skills: Excellent typing skills with speeds of at least 60 words per minute.

Computer Proficiency: First-class computer skills are a must.

Attention to Detail: A keen eye for detail to ensure data accuracy.

Reliability: Dependable and consistent performance is essential.

Our Secret Sauce

People: We look for coachable individuals who love working with people and align with our values. When these A-Players come together, they excel and have fun doing so.

Process: Our high-performance team thrives on continually refining processes and encouraging team contributions for improvement.

Professional Growth: We are committed to personal and professional development, featuring a monthly book club and a focus on continuous improvement.

Career Advancement: This entry-level position offers opportunities for growth and advancement for those with a growth mindset.

Benefits

Competitive Compensation: Enjoy a base hourly salary with opportunities for performance-based incentives and bonuses.

Comprehensive Training: Receive thorough training from the start to ensure your success.

Work-Life Balance: Monday to Friday schedule with weekends and major holidays off.

Career Development: Access ongoing training and professional development opportunities.

Join Our Team

If you are ready to be part of a winning and competitive culture, apply today and take the first step towards an exciting career with us!

Employment Type: Full-Time
